text: banteabpi pru tde kar noh chetd robsa puok anak nowte rungrousa ddel vea hakdauchchea dom thm ryy rung cheang dom thm towtiet . pitabrakd nasa phtang thm khleah phosa tuk chenh klaycha t ne l cheachraen . haey pitabrakd nasa phtang thm khleahtiet be reah bek thveu aoy tukhaur chenhokraw . haey pitabrakd nasa phtang thm khleahtiet thleak pi leu phnom mk daoysaarte kar kaotakhlach a l laoh . haey a l laoh min prongeuy k ndeu y nouv avei del puok anak kampoung br pru td noh laey
